amendment.description: At the end of division A (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the procurement, the deployment, or the research, development, test, and evaluation of a space-based ballistic missile intercept layer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to prohibit the use of funds to develop a space-based ballistic missile intercept layer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Foster.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
